data.eml:eml: Redescription of Chilenoperla puerilis (Gripopterygidae: Plecoptera) from the eastern Andes of Patagonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pessacq, Pablo (2016): Redescription of Chilenoperla puerilis (Gripopterygidae: Plecoptera) from the eastern Andes of Patagonia. Zootaxa 4109 (1): 89-95, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4109.1.8
